responses: Greetings, human! How can I assist you today?
Hello there! Ready to conquer the world?
Howdy, partner! What brings you to these parts?
Farewell, my friend! Until we meet again!
Take care! Don't do anything I wouldn't do!
Bye! May the force be with you!
See you soon! Don't forget to write!
Glad I could be of service!
Sure thing! What do you need help with?
I'm here to assist! What's on your mind?
Of course! Lay it on me!
How can I make your day better?
